body.p: Biographical information on Friedrich Hofmeister, and on the publishing firm which he founded (Friedrich Hofmeister Verlag, Leipzig), may be found in Axel Beer's article 'Friedrich Hofmeister' in Die Musik in Geschichte und Gegenwart. Click here for an English translation by Elizabeth Robinson.
Details of the history of the Hofmeister Monatsberichte (and the Whistling Handbuch which preceded them) may be found in

bibl.xref: Rudolf Elvers and Cecil Hopkinson, 'A survey of the Music Catalogues of Whistling and Hofmeister, Fontes Artis Musicae 19 (1972), 1-7
